fees.description: May be charged when manually reconnecting or reading your meter when you move into a property or change retailer. Incl GST. Fees may vary.
May be charged when manually disconnecting or reading your meter when you move out of a property or change retailer. Incl GST. Fees may vary.
Fee may be charged when remotely reconnecting your meter when you move into a property or change retailer. Includes GST. Fees may vary.
Fee may be charged when remotely disconnecting your meter when you move out of a property or change retailer. Includes GST. Fees may vary.
Fee may be charged when manually disconnecting your meter in other circumstances, such as non-payment. Includes GST. Fees may vary.
May be charged when manually reconnecting in other circumstances, such as after disconnection for non-payment. Includes GST. Fees may vary
A late payment fee may be charged when full payment has not been received by the bill due date. This amount is not subject to GST
The amount is GST inclusive and applies to card payments made at Australia Post outlets.
An over the counter payment fee may apply for payments made in-person at a Post Office. Includes GST.
A paper bill fee may apply for each bill sent by post. Includes GST.
The amount is GST inclusive and applies to payments made by Visa debit cards.
The amount is GST inclusive and applies to payments made by Visa credit cards.
The amount is GST inclusive and applies to payments made by Mastercard debit cards.
The amount is GST inclusive and applies to payments made by Mastercard credit cards.

electricityContract.terms: Offer applies to customers with an applicable network tariff. For solar feed-in tariff eligibility, or for further information about the T&Cs applicable to this energy offer, please contact AGL on 131 245 or visit agl.com.au. AGL's standard retail contract rates are updated periodically on agl.com.au/src. For solar customers, discounts are applied before solar credits are applied.
electricityContract.variation: Energy rates may be varied at any time with written notice to you. We will give you written notice at least 5 business days prior. Other charges and tariffs, including daily export caps and Solar Feed-in Tarriffs, may be varied with notice to you

eligibility.description: AGL Solar Savers is only available to customers with a total inverter capacity of no greater than 10kW, and who are not receiving a FiT from a government scheme.  Further eligibility conditions apply, see www.agl.com.au/solarterms for details

singleRate.description: Separately metered usage. The hours of application are determined by your Distributor.
Separately metered usage. The hours of application are determined by your Distributor.

greenPowerCharges.description: For $1 per week inc. GST we ensure energy equal to 20% of your usage will be fed into the grid from Accredited GreenPower generators.
For 4.4c /kWh inc. GST we ensure energy equal to 100% of your usage will be fed into the grid from Accredited GreenPower generators.

solarFeedInTariff.description: AGL Retailer Feed-in Tariff for the first 10kWh per day (<10kWh per day)
AGL Retailer Feed-in Tariff Thereafter (>10kWh per day)

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: Your market contract is ongoing. From time to time, AGL reviews its offers and this offer will be reviewed with consideration to AGLÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s generally available market offers
electricityContract.additionalFeeInformation: Additional fees and charges may apply. Please see the AGL fee schedules at agl.com.au/fees
